subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Guards Larry Wright and Mike Cavataio will transfer from St. John’s after the spring semester. Red Storm Coach Norm Roberts said that Wright, who averaged 9.1 points in 18.9 minutes as a sophomore last season, announced his intention to transfer because of an illness involving a member of his immediate family.
